materials.name: copper(I) trifluoromethylthiolate complexes [(bpy)CuI(SCF3)] (1 a), [(dmbpy)CuI(SCF3)] (1 b), and [(dtbpy)CuI(SCF3)] (1 c), and dimeric complexes [{(phen)CuI(SCF3)}2] (1 d) and [{(Me2phen)CuI(SCF3)}2] (1 e)

synthesis_conditions.equipment: oven-dried resealable Schlenk tube with a Teflon screw valve

step_1.description: The solid was redissolved in 6 mL of CH3CN and 2,2’-bipyridine in 15 mL of Et2O was added. The solution was kept at -25 8C for 24 h.

synthesis_conditions.yield: 84 % for 1 a, 88 % for 1 b, 97 % for 1 c

synthesis_conditions.equipment: flame-dried 5 mL test tube with Teflon screw cap equipped with a magnetic stir bar
synthesis_conditions.yield: Good to excellent yields (76–90 % for neutral alkyl- and aryl-substituted aromatic iodides, 84 % for para-acetyl substituted iodoarenes, 82 % for ortho-acetyl substituted iodoarenes, 57–81 % for iodoarenes with electron-deficient or electron-donating groups, 75 % for chlorine functionality on aryl iodide, 71–84 % for heteroaryl iodides and bromides)
